Focused_Shot.help: You quickly fire an armor-piercing round from one of your pistols. The target suffers an initial burst of lethal damage and additional lethal damage over time.
Focused_Shot.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Dual_Shot.help: You fire an armor-piercing round from each of your pistols. The target suffers an initial burst of lethal damage and additional lethal damage over time. The target also suffers reduced defenses and may be knocked down.
Dual_Shot.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DMG (Lethal), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
Dual_Shot.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time and your defenses have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Barrage.help: You fire armor-piercing rounds in a barrage of rapid fire bullets. These strike multiple targets in a cone in front of you, dealing lethal damage and lowering damage resistances. There is also a chance for affected targets to be knocked down.
Barrage.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), High DoT (Lethal), -RES (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
Barrage.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time and your resistances have been reduced.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Storm_of_Bullets.help: You fire numerous bullets at your target so fast that the eye cannot keep up, striking them and all foes around them. This causes a warped bullet trajectory, which causes lethal damage with each hit, as well as an additional chance to knock the target back. The lingering effects of the storm reduce the target's resistances.
Storm_of_Bullets.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT (Lethal), -RES (Foe, All), Chance for Knockback (Foe)
Storm_of_Bullets.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time and your resistances have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Piercing_Rounds.help: You take aim and fire a single, powerful armor-piercing round at your target. The target suffers lethal damage, followed by additional lethal damage over time. The bullet rends the target's protections, reducing their defense and resistances.
Piercing_Rounds.shortHelp: Ranged (Narrow Cone), High DMG(Lethal), High DoT(Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), -RES (Foe, All)
Piercing_Rounds.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time and both your defenses and resistances have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Debilitating_Shot.help: You fire a special armor-piercing round at your opponent that erupts into shrapnel on impact. The target suffers lethal damage as a result of this, along with reduced regeneration, recovery and chance to hit. There is also a chance the target may be stunned.
Debilitating_Shot.shortHelp: Ranged, Extreme DMG (Lethal), -Regen (Foe), -Rec (Foe), -ToHit (Foe), Chance to Stun (Foe)
Debilitating_Shot.targetHelp: Your regeneration, recovery and chance to hit have been reduced. Additionally, you may be stunned for a short time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

messages.attackerHit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

Hurricane_Shot.help: You fire many rounds in all directions around yourself, striking all nearby targets with your bullets. This causes lethal damage over time to all affected targets. Additionally, targets suffer from reduced resistances against all types of damage.
Hurricane_Shot.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time and your resistances have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Paralytic_Shot.help: You chamber an armor-piercing round at your target that explodes into shrapnel on impact. The force of this round causes paralyzes your opponent, holding them in place while also causing lethal damage. There is a chance that the target will also suffer reduced regeneration and recovery.
Paralytic_Shot.shortHelp: Ranged, Superior DMG (Lethal), Hold (Foe), Chance for -Regen (Foe), -Rec (Foe)
Paralytic_Shot.targetHelp: You are held in place and unable to move. Your regeneration and recovery may also be reduced.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
